songs.title: Apology to Fans
songs.lyrics:
TO MY DEAREST FANS in ANTWERP

I’ve never postponed a show in my life
It was very hard for me
I promise I will make it up very soon
I’m sorry if I disappointed you

Thank you for your concern
I'm feeling much better now
And I'm ready to give you a great show

See you tonight

All my love
Beyonce
